articles.content:
With about 10 seconds left, Kansas grabbed the ball, leading by 9. NC State didn't foul.
Somehow, Kansas didn't cover the 8.5-point spread.
Kansas was an 8- or 8.5-point favorite at BetMGM, dependi… [+1416 chars]
